chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A drop of rain drips all the way down from the flag on the roof to the door.
humanum_full_description_en:
Oracle is used as the original meaning to indicate the household of the portal, "Ji Si Bu, Qi Ting Xi Hu" ("Ye" 3.41.6). Bronze is used as the clan name. Bamboo and silk are also used as the original meaning, "Mawangdui. Laozi Jiaben: "Do not come from the household, but know the world."

"Shuowen": "Households, protectors. Half-doors are called households. Pictograms. All households belong to the households. 㦿, the ancient Chinese households follow the woods." Among them, the household protectors belong to Yinxun.
128 Characters
humanum_short_description_en: Jia Jinwen is like a door, "Jade Chapter": "Households, so you can enter and leave. One door is called a household, and two doors are called a door." Later, the door is extended to people and residents.
humanum_full_description:
甲骨文用作本義，表示門戶之戶，「己巳卜，其啓庭西戶」(《鄴》3.41.6)。金文用作族氏名。簡帛也用作本義，《馬王堆．老子甲本》：「不出於戶，以知天下。」

　　《說文》：「戶，護也。半門曰戶。象形。凡戶之屬皆从戶。㦿，古文戶从木。」其中，戶護比擬，屬於音訓。
128 Characters
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象一扇門之形，《玉篇》：「戶，所以出入也。一扉曰戶，兩扉曰門。」後由門戶引申為人家、住戶。

(Simplified: 户)
Chinese Definition:
Pictographic: A door swinging on its hinge
  • ⿻ Overlaid
    • 尸 [ shī ] body, corpse
①一扇門，門：門戶。窗戶。戶樞不蠹。夜不閉戶。
②人家：戶口。戶主。門戶之見(亦指派別上的成見)。
③會計部門稱賬冊上有業務關係的團體或個人：戶頭。開戶。
④門第：門當戶頭。
⑤姓氏。
戶口 [ hù kǒu ]: population (counted as number of households for census or taxation); registered residence; residence permit; (in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
(Simplified: 户)
Chinese Definition:
Pictographic: A door swinging on its hinge
HSK: 4
Chinese: A drop of national pride is okay, but those flags people have sticking out of their doors are annoying.
Meaning: door
Hanzi: 户
Story: A drop of rain drips all the way down from the flag on the roof to the door.
Kind: traditional

甲骨文用作本義，表示門戶之戶，「己巳卜，其啓庭西戶」(《鄴》3.41.6)。金文用作族氏名。簡帛也用作本義，《馬王堆．老子甲本》：「不出於戶，以知天下。」 《說文》：「戶，護也。半門曰戶。象形。凡戶之屬皆从戶。㦿，古文戶从木。」其中，戶護比擬，屬於音訓。 128 Characters
Oracle is used as the original meaning to indicate the household of the portal, "Ji Si Bu, Qi Ting Xi Hu" ("Ye" 3.41.6). Bronze is used as the clan name. Bamboo and silk are also used as the original meaning, "Mawangdui. Laozi Jiaben: "Do not come from the household, but know the world." "Shuowen": "Households, protectors. Half-doors are called households. Pictograms. All households belong to the households. 㦿, the ancient Chinese households follow the woods." Among them, the household protectors belong to Yinxun. 128 Characters

戶字的基本解释

戶
hù
同“户”。

戶字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hù］
“户1”的旧字形。

戶字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【户字部】　戶； 康熙笔画：4； 页码：页414第32
〔古文〕㦿?【唐韻】【正韻】侯古切【集韻】【韻會】後五切，?音祜。【說文】護也。【釋名】所以謹護閉塞也。【六書精薀】室之口也。凡室之口曰戶，堂之口曰門。內曰戶，外曰門。一扉曰戶，兩扉曰門。【易·節卦】不出戶庭。【詩·豳風】塞向墐戶。　又民居曰編戶。【唐六典】戶部掌天下戶口。　又止也。【左傳·宣十二年】屈蕩戶之。【註】止也。又【前漢·王嘉傳】坐戶殿門失闌免。【註】掌守殿門，止不當入者，而失闌入之。　又【爾雅·釋地】觚竹北戶。【註】北戶，南方之國。【疏】卽日南郡也。師古曰：言其在日之南，所謂北戶以向日者。又【禮·月令】蟄蟲咸動，啓戶始出。【註】戶，猶穴也。　又飮酒有大小戶。【吳志】孫皓每饗宴，人以七升爲限，小戶雖不入，?澆灌取盡。【白居易詩】戶大嫌甜酒。　又姓。漢有戶尊。　又與昈通。文采貌。【揚雄·蜀都賦】戶豹能黃。　又與濩通。湯樂名。【揚雄·蜀都賦】戶音六成。　又翁姑切，音烏。【淮南子·時則訓】烏孫國，作戶孫。

戶字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
戶字的起名意思

暂无。
